description: Detects specific commands commonly used to remove or empty the syslog Author: Max Altgelt. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Commands to Clear or Remove the Syslog
query: ((*rm\ \/var\/log\/syslog* OR *rm\ \-r\ \/var\/log\/syslog* OR *rm\ \-f\ \/var\/log\/syslog* OR *rm\ \-rf\ \/var\/log\/syslog* OR *mv\ \/var\/log\/syslog* OR *\ >\/var\/log\/syslog* OR *\ >\ \/var\/log\/syslog*) AND (NOT (*\/syslog.*)))
